title: Research Assistant Corbette's Personnel File
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

**Name:** Research Assistant Salman "Fish Car" Corbette[[footnote]] Other pseudonyms include: Salmander, Penis Breath, and Frank [[/footnote]]

**Security Clearance:** 2

**Occupation:** --Does all the Bitch Work-- --Assistant Researcher-- --Bitch Worker-- --RESEARCHER!!!-- Deceased

**Current Location:** Office set to be built under Site-19 expansion

**History:** Originally recruited from ██████████ University following reports of unusual modifications to vehicles, electronic devices, and candies[[footnote]] Specifically, the emergence of "anonymously mediocre" lollipops. [[/footnote]]. Although recruited with the intent of placement in engineering, Research Assistant Corbette expressed extreme disinterest, stating "It ain't fun anymore". Relocated to Site-19 and placed into research staff. 

Salman Corbette experienced cardiac arrest and died on June 12, 2014, the same day as his promotion to researcher. His work is continued by [http://www.scp-wiki.net/dr-rogets-file Dr. Roget.]

**SCPs Documented:**
